verses.verse: A Psalm. Oh sing <S%H7891><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%>; For he hath done <S%H6213><s%> marvellous things <S%H6381><s%>: His right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and his holy <S%H6944><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, hath wrought salvation for him <S%H3467><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made known <S%H3045><s%> his salvation <S%H3444><s%>: His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> hath he openly showed <S%H1540><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

He hath remembered <S%H2142><s%> his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and his faithfulness <S%H530><s%> toward the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: All the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.
Make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all the earth <S%H776><s%>: Break forth and sing <S%H2167><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%>, yea <S%H2167><s%>, sing praises.
Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> with the harp <S%H3658><s%>; With the harp <S%H3658><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of melody <S%H2172><s%>.
With trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and sound <S%H6963><s%> of cornet <S%H7782><s%> Make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the King <S%H4428><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar <S%H7481><s%>, and the fulness <S%H4393><s%> thereof <S%H8398><s%>; The world, and they that dwell therein <S%H3427><s%>;
Let the floods <S%H5104><s%> clap <S%H4222><s%> their hands <S%H3709><s%>; Let the hills <S%H2022><s%> sing for joy <S%H7442><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For he cometh <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>: He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> with righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, And the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with equity <S%H4339><s%>.
